I'm currently on a Hiatus with DC and Marvel. (Because of reasons) And I'm slowly coming back into my Anime/Videogame fandoms of my childhood and newer ones ect. I've been shipping all my life, but those include H/HR, Reylo, Zutara, Sheith, Damijon, Mo He-tain ect.

summary: to the first: V is 23. Depending on what you choose, he had a not so nice life. He’s basically still a kid and perhaps a lonely...
caption:
• to the first: V is 23. Depending on what you choose, he had a not so nice life. He’s basically still a kid and perhaps a lonely one too. Let Jackie be a nice big bro for once. 
  • to the second: Jackie be like “kids these days…”
  • and to the last: who doesn’t love cuddles!?

summary: All the people coming for CP20XX
title: All the people coming for CP20XX
body:
It makes me wonder how many realise the setting creator is Mike Pondsmith - a rarity in the RPG industry in earlier and sadly currently, years, in that he’s a Black man. I mean, it doesn’t excuse the issues with the TTRPG, and being a minority doesn’t exclude one from misunderstanding or getting things wrong, or being problematic etc.

But guys? I don’t think you get how rare it is that a major franchise now getting millions in dollars and exposure in the TTRPG, RPG, video and popular culture  game industry has been created someone who isn’t white. Pondsmith is a pioneer, in many ways. Pioneers don’t always get it right, but it should be noted.

reblog.comment:

But guys? I don’t think you get how rare it is that a major franchise now getting millions in dollars and exposure in the TTRPG, RPG, video and popular culture  game industry has been created someone who isn’t white. Pondsmith is a pioneer, in many ways. Pioneers don’t always get it right, but it should be noted.

It makes me wonder how many realise the setting creator is Mike Pondsmith - a rarity in the RPG industry in earlier and sadly currently, years, in that he’s a Black man. I mean, it doesn’t excuse the issues with the TTRPG, and being a minority doesn’t exclude one from misunderstanding or getting things wrong, or being problematic etc.

But guys? I don’t think you get how rare it is that a major franchise now getting millions in dollars and exposure in the TTRPG, RPG, video and popular culture  game industry has been created someone who isn’t white. Pondsmith is a pioneer, in many ways. Pioneers don’t always get it right, but it should be noted.

It makes me wonder how many realise the setting creator is Mike Pondsmith - a rarity in the RPG industry in earlier and sadly currently, years, in that he’s a Black man. I mean, it doesn’t excuse the issues with the TTRPG, and being a minority doesn’t exclude one from misunderstanding or getting things wrong, or being problematic etc.

But guys? I don’t think you get how rare it is that a major franchise now getting millions in dollars and exposure in the TTRPG, RPG, video and popular culture  game industry has been created someone who isn’t white. Pondsmith is a pioneer, in many ways. Pioneers don’t always get it right, but it should be noted.

summary: The CyberPunk 2077 Outrage From Journalist Has Gotten Out Of Hand!
title: The CyberPunk 2077 Outrage From Journalist Has Gotten Out Of Hand!
body:
The CyberPunk 2077 Outrage From Journalist Has Gotten Out Of Hand!

This is absolutely insane! To think that now, journalist are attacking YouTubers and fans for getting excited for CyberPunk 2077 at such an aggressive level, really highlights their intent to force their agenda down everyone’s throat. Even if it’s under a good intention.

(more…)

summary:
With all the excitement over Cyberpunk 2077 my friends and I have decided to play a campaign of Cyberpunk 2020 to prepare. 
So...
body:
With all the excitement over Cyberpunk 2077 my friends and I have decided to play a campaign of Cyberpunk 2020 to prepare.

So here’s my character, a Fixer named Liam “Defib” Valdez. He’s a persuasive boy who just wants to keep his family safe.
